title: Charging process - rod sphere wire and ground

content.prompt: Which of the following correctly indicates whether the final charge on the sphere is positive or negative, and provides a valid justification?

choices.label: Positive, because negative charge carriers have moved from the sphere to ground.
Positive, because positive charge carriers have moved from ground to the sphere.
Negative, because negative charge carriers have moved from ground to the sphere.
Negative, because positive charge carriers have moved from the sphere to ground.
